Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 93-398.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating certain rivers in the State of Michigan for potential additions to the national wild and scenic rivers system.

summary.text: Designates portions of the Au Sable and Mainstee Rivers in Michigan for potential additions to the national wild and scenic rivers system under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating certain rivers in the State of Michigan for potential additions to the national wild and scenic rivers system.
